curseofpandora.tooltip.abyssal.crown: For every %s blocks below 0, you gain +%s%% chance for melee damage to bypass magic
curseofpandora.tooltip.abyssal.shell: For every %s blocks below 0, you gain +%s%% Armor and Armor Toughness
curseofpandora.tooltip.abyssal.treasure: For every %s blocks below 0, you gain 1 Luck
curseofpandora.tooltip.abyssal.watcher: For every %s blocks below 0, you gain %s%% regeneration per second
curseofpandora.tooltip.abyssal.will: Reduce depth requirement for Abyssal pandora charms
curseofpandora.tooltip.angel.check: Effective only when player is under sky
curseofpandora.tooltip.angel.descent: All damage against undead mobs is increased by %s%%.
curseofpandora.tooltip.angel.protection: Works as an unbreakable totem of undying with a cool down of %s seconds.
curseofpandora.tooltip.angel.punishment_: All Angelic pandora charms triggers when not under sky as well.
Damage dealt to target will be at least %s%% of their current health. This effect can trigger at most once every %s seconds.
curseofpandora.tooltip.angel.wing: When player is elytra flying, gives player a velocity boost.
curseofpandora.tooltip.angel.wing_immune: Player takes no damage for falling and flying into wall.
curseofpandora.tooltip.curse.flesh: Negate all max health bonus. If player maintains at least %s food level for %s minutes, grant +%s%% max health.
curseofpandora.tooltip.curse.inertia: Negate all other non-tool attack speed bonus. Cap player attack speed to %s. When player attack speed is %s or lower, grant %s%% attack speed bonus.
curseofpandora.tooltip.curse.metabolism_: Gain %s%% attack and speed per food level above %s.
Loss %s%% attack, speed, and attack speed per food level below %s.
When food level is full, gain %s%% attack and speed, and negate all speed reduction
curseofpandora.tooltip.curse.proximity: Negate all other non-tool attack reach bonus. Cap player attack reach to %s. When player attack reach is %s or lower, grant %s%% attack reach bonus.
curseofpandora.tooltip.curse.prudence_1: When you hit a target, your damage to the same target for the next %s second will -%s%% (stackable).
curseofpandora.tooltip.curse.prudence_2: Your damage dealt against a target cannot exceed %s%% of target max health.
curseofpandora.tooltip.curse.spell_1: Enchantments on your weapons and armors will put a burden on you, increase damage you take and reduce damage you dealt. Use equipments with high enchantment affinity and gain spell tolerance to mitigate that.
curseofpandora.tooltip.curse.tension_1: When you hit a target, place a Terror Token on it. Tokens take %s seconds to mature, then increase your damage to it by %s%% for %s seconds, stacking to at most %s levels.
curseofpandora.tooltip.curse.tension_2: When a mob deals you a damage higher than %s%% of your current health, all Terror Token from you breaks, and you cannot deal damage to that target for %s seconds
curseofpandora.tooltip.elemental.curse_1: Gain 1 Spell Tolerance for every armors with curse enchantment.
curseofpandora.tooltip.elemental.curse_2: +%s%% magic damage for every curse enchantment on your armors.
curseofpandora.tooltip.elemental.earth: Effective only when player attack speed is %s or lower
curseofpandora.tooltip.elemental.waving: Effective only when player is in water or rain
curseofpandora.tooltip.elemental.wind_1: Effective only when player is sprinting
curseofpandora.tooltip.hell.crown: All weak undead mobs around you will listen to your command.
curseofpandora.tooltip.hell.crystal: When you are attacked by non-undead mobs, redirect the attack to a random undead mob within %s blocks. Cool down: %s seconds.
curseofpandora.tooltip.hell.eye: When you damage a target, the target will deal a small magic damage to all monsters around it within %s blocks. Has a cool down of %s seconds.
curseofpandora.tooltip.hell.reformation_: You are immune to Soul Flame damage, but you are not immune to the effect even when you have Cleansed effect.
When you deal damage to targets while you are on Soul Flame effect, inflict the target with same level and duration of Soul Flame
curseofpandora.tooltip.hell.skull: When you damage a target on Soul Flame effect with at least %s seconds duration, increase the effect level by 1, capped at your Reality Index.
curseofpandora.tooltip.misc.bind: This item cannot be taken down.
curseofpandora.tooltip.misc.reality: When you have at least %s Reality Index:
curseofpandora.tooltip.shadow.consolidat: When you hit targets with shadow effect, after %3$s second, their shadow will scatter and attack surrounding mobs within %1$s blocks, dealing %2$s%% of original damage dealt. This effect can trigger once every %4$s seconds.
curseofpandora.tooltip.shadow.convergenc: Heal %s%% of the damage you dealt to target with Shadow effect
curseofpandora.tooltip.shadow.core_1: Inflict shadow effect on attack target with duration of %s seconds per your Reality Index.
curseofpandora.tooltip.shadow.core_2: Shadow effect will reduce damage mobs dealt by %s%%
curseofpandora.tooltip.shadow.reformatio: +%s%% magic damage against target with Shadow effect
-%s%% physical damage from mobs with Shadow effect
curseofpandora.tooltip.shadow.void: Shadow damage you dealt becomes void shadow damage.
effect.curseofpandora.prudence.descripti: For render only. Shows if your damage is reduced due to Curse of Prudence effect.
effect.curseofpandora.terror_token.descr: For render only. Shows Mature Terror Token count on target.
effect.curseofpandora.terror_token_pre.d: For Render only. Shows premature Terror Token on target.
effect.curseofpandora.terrorized.descrip: For render only. Shows if you cannot deal damage against this target due to Curse of Tension effect.
item.curseofpandora.bless_of_lava_walker: Allows you to walk on lava
item.curseofpandora.orb_of_stability.des: When attacked, you won't be knocked back, and your screen won't shake
trait.curseofpandora.reality.desc: Immune to damage from entities will less reality index than rank of this trait.
